title: If you killed an enemy using W-E-R-Q....
body: Then I guess you could say that your combo WERQed.

replies.body: Is that how that works? I always just tried to WREQ my opponents.
WERQ...Q.Q.Q.Q would be Evelyn's combo, but now that I think about it, I can't recall any champions that have WREQ for a combo.
